short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy code from StackOverflow, Github, W3Schools, TutorialsPoint... and hundredrs of developers websites without breaking a sweat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copykod identifies code snippets on web pages and adds a button allowing to copy them instantly. It works on hundreds of developers websites and documentation pages like Github, Stackoverflow...
